alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Casper Mountain; Cody Foothills; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 1:05PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Scattered Showers and Thunderstorms Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Some storms may become strong and produce brief heavy rain, hail around half an inch, and gusty outflow winds over 40 mph. * WHERE...Southwest WY into central and north-central WY. * WHEN...This afternoon through 6 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Marginally severe thunderstorms are possible today across portions of central Wyoming. Be alert to potentially rapidly-changing weather conditions.
